footer.description: Full Stack & 3D Developer specializing in React.js, Three.js, and Node.js. I create interactive and immersive web experiences.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: Hello! I am a Full Stack developer passionate about creating interactive and immersive web experiences. With expertise in React.js, Three.js, and Node.js, I build modern web applications that combine functionality and attractive design.
about.bio: My name is Sersif Abdeljalil, a developer passionate about modern web technologies and digital innovation. I design interactive and dynamic solutions by combining my skills in React.js, Node.js, and Three.js to deliver immersive user experiences.

education.title: Education
education.details: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Applied Mathematics (specialized in web development and databases) - Chouaïb Doukkali University. Master's degree in Computer Engineering and Data Analysis (2IAD) - Chouaïb Doukkali University.

experience.title: Experience
experience.details: Development of a mobile library management application for the Ennajah library in El Jadida (2024-2025).
